topology

Class StreamProducer

  • java.lang.Object
    • topology.StreamProducer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class StreamProducer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This runnable class accepts stream frames, orders them and produces an ordered sequence of frames which is saved to a file. Also displays the results on the canvas as they appear.
